titles.title: Still Still With Thee (easy, nice, word fit no

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Still still with Thee When purple morning breaketh When the bird waketh And the shadows flee Fairer than morning Lovelier than the daylight Dawns the sweet consciousness I am with Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As in the dawning O'-er the waveless ocean The image of The morning star doth rest So in this stillness Thou beholdest only Thine image in the waters of my breast{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When sinks the soul Subdued by toil to slumber Its closing eye looks up to Thee in prayer Sweet the repose Beneath thy wings o'ershadowing But sweeter still to wake And find Thee there{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So shall it be At last In that bright morning When the soul waketh And life's shadows flee Oh in that hour Fairer than daylight's dawning Shall rise the glorious thought I am with Thee{/lang-eng}
